title: Very nice hotel in Times Square area
text:
My mom and I recently stayed here, and this was a great find, with a friendly staff. Our room was nice, of course on the smaller side as is pretty standard in NYC hotels, but the fridge and microwave was a great perk (only in certain rooms), and we had a nice view. The wifi worked very well throughout our stay. Also liked the complimentary daily breakfast.
Only suggestion would be to look into possibly adding a 2nd elevator, although the wait was not too long since the hotel didn't seem to be at capacity during our stay. But I think that would be helpful. Otherwise I'd definitely recommend this hotel.
